CommonFields.Title: Interfacial Effect on Dielectric Properties of Polymer Nanocomposites Filled with Core/Shell-Structured Particles
Author: Shen, Y.
Lin, Y. H.
Nan, C.-W.
CommonFields.Location: Department of Materials Science and Engineering, State Key Laboratory of New Ceramics and Fine Processing, Tsinghua University, Beijing 10084 (P.R. China)

Mixing.Description: After mixing, the solution was then trans- ferred and sealed in a 40 mL Teflon-sealed autoclave.
The final products were rinsed in three cycles of centrifuging/washing/redispersion in deionized water, alcohol, and ethylene glycol monomethyl ether (EGME).

ChooseParameter.Other: Finally, an appropriate amount of the resultant solution mixture was dropped on the substrates to obtain film of about 80 lm in thickness, and dried thoroughly to evaporate the solvent and cure the epoxy matrix.

ImageFile.Description: TEM image of nano- composite films with 24 vol % Shell_8 Ag@C nanoparticles.
